org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.specific.job

Class StatelessJob<Match extends IPatternMatch>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.api.Job<Match>
      • org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.specific.job.StatelessJob<Match>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SequentialProcessorsJob

    public class StatelessJob<Match extends IPatternMatch>
extends Job<Match>
    This class represents a Job that uses an IMatchProcessor on the match of the activation when executed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
